resources.string: 一个类似『应用变量』的可在宿主应用内完成配置的适用于『LSPatch 便携模式』的模块
This module is made by YukiHookAPI. \nLearn more https://github.com/fankes/YukiHookAPI
After hiding the app icon, the interface may be closed and will no longer be displayed on the launcher. You can find and open the module settings in EdXposed or LSPosed.
Note: Be sure to turn off the \"Force apps to show launcher icons\" feature in LSPosed
